content: In the third quarter, the average mobile MAUs of our interactive order entertainment business grew to $9.5 million, with its user penetration rate climbing to 19.1%, accompanied by an improvement in the average spend per paying user, contributing to our order entertainment business revenue growth. In the third quarter, our total net revenues were RMB565.2 million, representing an increase of 12% year-over-year, primarily due to growth in average user spending on our audio entertainment products. Cost of revenue was RMB376.2 million in the third quarter of 2022, representing an increase of 6% year-over-year, primarily due to an increase in the revenue share fees to accounting creators and the company's revenue growth and partially offset by decreases in the canary and with benefits expenses related to decreases in our operational headcount and share-based compensation expenses.
